name: Paintbrush Vs Pencil
description:
A platformer game with a puzzle aspect where the player must figure out how to traverse each room without touching the second player or the incorrect colour! A simple game made for the Colours 2022 game jam! This is more of a demo game than a full game. There's 4 levels though one is a tutorial one. As this was made within 3 days there might be a few bugs but I hope people enjoy it!

Controls:

Paintbrush: WASD to move

Pencil: Does the opposite of whatever paintbrush does!

Colour avoidance: At the top of the screen for each level a colour will be shown. If either player character touches the colour then both die and the level resets!
